name: Super Bomberman Blast Engine
description:
This is a project being worked on by a team of professional coders.You can ask to help develop the game,  but we aren't accepting too many devs because of clutter. Super Bomberman Blast is a Bomberman fan-game focusing on the retro days of Bomberman. It will take mechanics and characters from the old games, but it will include new elements such as:

-A Full Story Mode                                 

- Completely New Characters

-New Stages

- HD Graphics

- References

- Online Game Mode

-A Bomber Pass
